Katerina Manolea (Κατερίνα Μανωλέα)

Your Local European Professional

Lawyer and Translator. Member of the Bar Association of Thessaloniki in Greece.

My studies include a Bachelor of Laws (LL.B.) at the Democritus University of Thrace in Greece, and a Master of Laws (LL.M.) at the University of Copenhagen in Denmark (Cand.jur.). Also, legal courses at the University of Bologna in Italy and at the HU University of Applied Sciences of Utrecht in the Netherlands.

I have been a member of a legal team in the E.U. Institutions in Brussels and have worked in Copenhagen. In Greece, I cooperate with other lawyers and a large notary firm.

I have worked pro bono for Save the Children and the local NGO Arsis
